false_positive_details.reason: Suggested adding @Override annotation - this is a style suggestion, not a bug. The method correctly overrides the parent class method.
Claimed NPE risk when webauthnAuth is null, but failed to read isConditionalPasskeysEnabled() which already checks webauthnAuth != null first.
Same false claim about NPE - the null check is already present in isConditionalPasskeysEnabled().

droid_missed: Conditional passkey UI not set up for initial login (user=null) - regression breaking ID-less passkey authentication

key_findings: Droid focused on NPE concerns but failed to read the full method implementation where null checks were already present
Droid completely missed the actual functional regression in the PR
Golden comment #2 correctly identified the real bug - that the change breaks ID-less passkey authentication on initial login
Golden comment #1 was poorly worded and unclear, likely a partial/confused version of comment #2
